data.title: Innos Note
data.des: An innovative document product developed by the innovation design team from 0 to 1, taking the document portal as the entry point to create an advanced first-class All in one knowledge creation tool, in which I was the main designer of several core modules.

data.title: Innovation UX Design
data.des: The innovation team's experimental design exploration provides forward-looking innovative design extrapolation for the suite's communication tools, helping the suite to enhance its competitiveness on the product.

data.title: MIGU Video App
data.des: MIGU Video is a vertical short video product launched by MIGU, a subsidiary of China Mobile Group, which provides users with secondary anime entertainment content around short videos, as well as related derivative merchandise.
